titles.title: Freeze Assistance Act of 1987

A bill to provide that the emergency assistance made available to certain agricultural producers by Public Law 99-591 shall be made available to apple producers for losses resulting from excessive cold.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Conservation Credit and Rural Development.

bill.summary: 2/19/1987--Introduced. Freeze Assistance Act of 1987 - Amends Federal law to make disaster emergency assistance under Public Law 99-591 available to certain apple producers.
